Title: New Old Stock LeJour Quartz PocketWatch-Gold Plated Case-NOT WORKING
Description: The movements on these are damaged from the battery corrosion...If you want this same pocket watch without damage, please see my other auctions.Also, the blue velvet pouch is NOT included with this auction...only the watch with NG on the crystal...A new old stock beautiful pocket watch from LeJour featuring a portrait of George Washington. The quality on this piece is amazing for this price! Gold filled case. Check out my feedback...Don't miss the chance to own this beautiful pocket watch! Watch is 2 5/8" x just shy of 2" round. Big, easy to read face. Beautiful details on back! I am very happy to offer this lovely watch. See all the positive feedback I have gotten on the LeJour watches!! You will love it! I am an authorized LeJour dealer! I get these watches directly from LeJour. Watch chains available at additional cost...please inquire if you are interested. ReturnPolicy.Description: Shipping costs both ways will be buyer's responsibility, unless my error. (Free shipping included) Items must be returned in exact same condition sent. Unopened items can only be returned unopened. If items are returned within 14 days, the restocking fee will be waived. Returns received from 15 days to 30 days will be assessed 20% restocking fee,in addition to shipping fee.

ConditionDescription: These were stored for a long time with battery inside...the battery corrosion has damaged the movement and it is likely that the movement will need to be replaced...The gold plated case may also be discolored...that is easily polished with a soft cloth and maybe a touch of silver polish..There is also NG written on the crystal that will need to be cleaned up..
